name: Duality (itch) (Studio Gemini, Valeria Trevino, Al Sumstad, PrimalDragon1740, Jeshua Johnson, bianchima, travis_scott_1)
name_original: Duality (itch) (Studio Gemini, Valeria Trevino, Al Sumstad, PrimalDragon1740, Jeshua Johnson, bianchima, travis_scott_1)
description:
You’ve lost your twin sister and a mysterious artifact has granted you the ability to cross between the real and spirit worlds. An even more mysterious spirit promises you can use your newfound ability to see her again—but beware the cost to the world around you. Is it one you’re willing to pay? 

Credits:
Matthew Bianchi - Programmer, Narrative Designer
Jaylen Davis - Level Designer, 3D Artist
Jeshua Johnson - Level Designer, Tech Artist
Colin Pool - Audio Designer
Travis Scott - Environment Artist, Designer
Al Sumstad - Artist, Narrative Designer
Ian Thorne - Programmer, Designer, Scrum Master
Valeria Treviño-Su - Animator, Rigger, Concept Artist
Jesse Zou - Programmer
Paul Toprac - Producer
Audrey Stein - Associate Producer
Noah Galloso - Assistant Producer
